data.name: Pranksterz: Off Your Boss
data.detailed_description:
Troubles on the job? Boss driving you crazy? Time to strike back!

Stop up the coffee-machine, unplug computers, and saw the legs off chairs. Make sure to take your pranks seriously though, you’ll need to be sneaky not to get caught, and you have to be smart to combine several tricks together for extra bonuses!

Non-stop antics, great cartoon-style graphics, various office settings and crazy animations will have you laughing for hours.

Pranksterz - He who laughs last, laughs best!

Features:

  • Play practical jokes and pranks on your nasty boss!
  • Use stealth and skill to set your plan in motion and escape detection
  • Gain bonuses for linking several pranks together
  • Great cartoon-style graphics and hilarious animations

Fun for all ages!

data.short_description: Using a wide range of props and tricks, Pranksterz: Off your Boss, let’s you play practical jokes and pranks on your Boss and co-workers to drive them mad!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible with 128 Mb of RAM and supporting shaders version 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any DirectX-compatible
